page.title: 10Local Groups
page.content: There are many groups in Denby. The {Denby Ladies}raise money throughout the year and run socials and trips for the old people.{Denby Sports and {Social and Social Club}run 2 football teams and 3 cricket teams in local leagues.{Denby Music Club} meets weekly - group of young people play the recorder and enter local festivals.{Denby Youth Club} meet every Thursday evening in the Church School.{Denby Discussion Group}meet monthly to talk of topics of local or national interest.{Denby Parochial {Church Council}organises social events and musical evenings.{Denby School PTA runs a variety of social and educational evenings.{St John's Sunday {School}meet in the church day school each Sunday at 10.30 am.{The {Gunthwaite Steam Preservation Society} renovate old farm machinery.
